sourcesContent:
# Name Channel Seasons
{{s.id}}
{{s.name}}
{{s.channel}}
{{s.seasons}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Serie } from './serie'; import { dataSeries } from './dataSeries'; import { SerieService } from './serie.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-serie', templateUrl: './serie.component.html', styleUrls: ['./serie.component.css'] }) export class SerieComponent implements OnInit { temporada: number = 0; promedio: number = 0; constructor(private serieService: SerieService) { } series: Array = []; getSeries() { this.serieService.getSeries().subscribe(series => { this.series = series; }); } // Aqui va el calculo de los promedios getPromedioTemporadas(){ this.serieService.getSeries().subscribe(series=>{ series.forEach(serie => this.temporada+=serie.seasons); this.promedio=this.temporada/series.length; }); } ngOnInit() { this.getSeries(); } }
